ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: Thanks are expressed to Gavin Sarre for data for A.Â butcheri in earlier periods and to many colleagues and friends who helped with data collection and in particular, Daniel Yeoh and Chris Hallett. Gratitude is expressed to Recfishwest, the Australian Fisheries Research and Development Corporation and the Department of Primary Industries and Regional Development for funding and to Murdoch University for various forms of support. The constructive comments of the two reviewers were greatly appreciated and have led to a substantially improved manuscript. This study was conducted in accordance with the conditions in permit R2561/13 issued by the Murdoch University Animal Ethics Committee.
